description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Venice, Italy. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Boutique Venice Waterfront Palace Stay
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the heritage and grandeur of Italy's floating city with a stay at Venice's stylishly sophisticated Il Palazzo Experimental, a converted Renaissance-era palace nestled on the northern edge of the Giudecca Canal. The boutique hotel balances the best of the famous canal city: hidden away from the hustle and bustle of the tourist-filled laneways and yet within easy reach of iconic attractions, including St Mark’s Basilica and Accademia Gallery. Surrounded by famously good restaurants and bars, and within easy walking distance of two vaporetto stops, it’s perfectly positioned for days spent eating and exploring. French designer Dorothée Meilichzon transformed the Il Palazzo Experimental into a seaside haven, introducing an Art Deco sophistication while maintaining the exposed beams and Gothic windows of the original palace. Ascend to the signature city-view cocktail bar to watch vaporettos buzz up and down the Giudecca Canal and perhaps savour a cicchetti or two with an aperitivo, summon a gondola to the palazzo's private pier or sequester yourself in the hotel's breathtaking garden, where you’ll have a front-row seat to all the locals’ comings and goings. Delve into the tastes of southern Italy with an evening in Ristorante Adriatica or settle in for cocktails at the Experimental Cocktail Club, where expert bartenders will shake or stir anything you fancy.

hotels.vendor_name: San Clemente Palace (previously known as San Clemente Palace Kempinski Venice)
hotels.title: Venice Five-Star Private Island Retreat on Secluded San Clemente
hotels.description: If you’re looking for the ultimate Italian sanctuary, the secluded San Clemente Palace has it all. Nestled on the private island of San Clemente, this five-star hotel boasts stunning vistas of the surrounding lagoon and the Piazza San Marco alongside oustanding facilities like a heated outdoor pool and luxurious spa. Indulge in modern Venetian and Italian dishes at Acquerello Restaurant or try a neo-Asian gastronomic experience at the poolside Buddha Bar Beach Restaurant. Venture out by complimentary boat service to explore historic Venice and its many cultural destinations and shopping opportunities, before heading back to enjoy the magnificent hospitality throughout your stay.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Venice Escape Overlooking St. Mark's Square & San Giorgio Maggiore Island
hotels.description: Get swept away in a world of Italian elegance at the five-star Baglioni Hotel Luna Venice, a prestigious waterfront abode overflowing with aristocratic ambience, just moments from St. Mark's Square. Part of the Luxury Hotels of the World collection, and home to luxurious rooms and suites adorned in antique furnishings and Venetian style, this renovated retreat invites you on a timeless journey through art, history and gastronomical delights. Stay in one of the most sought-after parts of Venice, just moments from St. Mark's Square and the Bridge of Sighs. Spend days navigating alleys and indulging in Italian cuisine or elevate romance on a private gondola ride through the breathtaking canal network.

hotels.title: Venice Indulgence with Tranquil Inner Garden & Onsite Venetian Restaurant
hotels.description: Get lost in the labyrinth of Venice's twisting alleyways and gondola-filled canals before retreating to Hotel Indigo Venice - Sant'Elena, an IHG Hotel for a moment of luxury between explorations. This converted 1930s monastery is now a tranquil escape with a serene inner garden area (perfect to enjoy a negroni or bellini), while the Savor Restaurant and Bar celebrates Venetian cuisine by serving an exquisite menu of seafood and handmade pasta, alongside an extensive list of curated fine wines.

hotels.title: Venice Refined Retreat near the Floating City
hotels.description: On the outskirts of Venice, the voco Venice Mestre - The Quid, an IHG Hotel, is a refined retreat perfect for romantic day trips into the floating city. Keep active at the fitness centre or enjoy seasonal fare and an extensive wine list at the Ludico Venice restaurant before sightseeing in one of Italy's most picturesque cities. After a memorable day exploring Renaissance architecture, imposing palaces, cathedrals and calming canals, return to rest and relax in a stylish and sophisticated room.
